features: ✈ 100% PURE MEMORY FOAM - Our memory foam travel pillow is 100% pure with no additives and is made of the exact same material as the world's leading memory foam manufacturers, unlike other travel pillows. Our ultra plush velour cover features an easy to use zipper and is machine washable. Fits adults and kids

✈ ERGONOMIC RAISED LOBE DESIGN - Standard U shaped neck pillows do not offer support for neck tilt from side to side, but the life hall neck pillow is designed with orthopedic raised lobe contouring on either side that allow your neck and head to lean comfortably against the soft yet supportive memory foam cushion. Ideal for sleeping in your seat during long plane flights or sitting upright in any type of chair.
✈【Perfect Travel Airplane&Car Partner】Adjustable rope design, easy to adapt to a variety of body size, easy to adjust the comfort,efect for cars, by plane, travel and at home.

✈ Portable to Carry: For its soft and folding feature, you can easily pack it in the including carrying bag and then put it in your backpack or luggage case. Just pick it and go anywhere you want to go.

✈ WARRANTY: GDEOUP offers a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you are not satisfied with our product or service for any reason, please feel free to contact us. We will either refund your money or redeliver a new product.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: We have focused on designing travel neck pillows for many years, and are committed to making comfortable and portable travel pillows, so that our journey can be more comfortable and sleep quality better! For this reason, we developed this travel neck pillow, which is our latest design.

We worked with sleep experts to develop this smart foam pillow, which provides multi-dimensional optimal support, prevents muscle pain and tension, and brings a perfect rest experience. Our travel neck pillow is versatile and convertible. You can use it to support your head, back, waist or cervical spine during a nap, while relaxing on the bed or sofa or reading.

Snap Button To Keep In Place Front snap helps the pillow stay in place, stop head from falling forward or leaning left or right! Washable Velour Cover pillowcase made of Super soft silver fox texture plush velour fine soft, not pilling, not fade, give your skin mild care. Removable and easy to clean Pillow cover has hidden zipper, removable and washable, clean and hygienic Removable and easy to clean superior-quality memory foam, with 3-5 second rebound technology, soft and comfortable, easy to cope with any way of sleeping!

Small figure easy to carry 1：The ergonomic C-shaped surround view design perfectly fits the contours of your neck and shoulders, helping to maintain a natural balance during sleep. 2：Small size and full filling, smooth and round lines, 360-degree support of the head. 3：Beautiful appearance, can be compressed to half of the original volume to carry, high resilience.

Tips: 1：Due to the display settings and pixel definition, the actual project color is slightly different from the image. Please refer to the actual product received; 2：There are some bubbles and hard particles in the memory foam pillow core. This is because the memory foam may produce some small holes due to the influence of trace gas during the foaming process of the mold, resulting in pores and hardening. This is a normal phenomenon, Does not affect normal use, please understand! 3：Odor problem. In the process of storage and transportation, due to the high temperature, there will be some smell of raw materials when the package is opened. It is recommended to place it in a ventilated and cool place before using it for the first time. 4：Due to packaging and transportation reasons, the product will be slightly wrinkled, but it will not affect the normal function, please rest assured to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well worth the money I spent!
reviews.reviewText: Believe it or not, I didn't buy this travel pillow to travel (I rarely get on planes these days). I bought it for my very frequent lunch naps. I work long hours at a desk in a stressful shop so these cat naps are what helps me reset and perform at my best. I open the shop early and often stay late so there's a lot of time where my eyes need a rest but the back of my chair isn't comfortable AT ALL and I often wake up with a very stiff neck and muscle soreness. I decided to invest in myself and get this adorable travel pillow. The memory foam is wonderfully soft and spongey, the dark black color is rich and doesn't stain easily, and the fit around my neck is snug and extraordinarily comfortable. Right out of the bag it had that weird plastic smell but that went away after a few days. I look forward to my office naps even more now! As a bonus, now I have a very comfy pillow that I can take with me if I ever need to travel by plane. I guarantee this one is way more comfy than the expensive cheaply made ones inside the airport!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great neck pillow
reviews.reviewText: I wish I would've ordered this first rather than the other brand I got. This is so much better! It actually wraps around my neck and I don't feel squished wearing it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Memory Neck pillow
reviews.reviewText: This pillow is as described, and the quality is excellent.But it is not be best fit for me. The neck opening and the pillow height fit is a little too big and high. I bought it to support my head after eye surgery to keep me from turning my head and sleeping on side of surgery. It is very uncomfortable for sleeping in bed regardless of which way I placed the snap opening. It is more comfortable wearing in a sitting position which makes it better for travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable and doesn't hurt your neck.

reviews.reviewText: I find this pillow to be much too firm to be comfortable.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gently firm: ideal neck and head support
reviews.reviewText: I use the pillow mainly for a 10-15 minute afternoon nap, leaning back in my desk chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Plush and Comfy!
reviews.reviewText: It arrived in a nifty satchel. The pillow is soft velvet like material that feels great against the skin. It's also very comfortable and provides good support. Defintely a great deal at the price and I'm very happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy! Yikes!
reviews.reviewText: The pillow was lumpy, doesn’t fit in the case, and has a very foul smell to it as others have mentioned. Hard as a rock.

reviews.reviewTitle: Zipper ripped, never even got to use for travel
reviews.reviewText: Product is firm I would say. The zipper material is not strong, broke second time unzipping it.
